summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2397 for the improvement of Latona Avenue from East 77th Street to East 85th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, under Ordinance No. 25112 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
